metadata.title: CVE-2022-23990 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Expat (aka libexpat) before 2.4.4 has an integer overflow in the doPrologfunction.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-23990` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

expat - 2.2.5-3ubuntu0.4
libexpat1 - 2.2.5-3ubuntu0.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: expat package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.2.5-3ubuntu0.4').
wbxml2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
